about_the_game:
"Dream Addict" is an action RPG set in a world of dreams. In this dream world, various animals and monsters inhabit the landscape. You’ll use swords and skills to defeat these creatures, earning "Battle Memories" in the process. These memories can be materialized at your home base to unlock new skills. By defeating enemies and exploring the dream world, you’ll grow stronger as you strive to reach the edge of your dreams. As you become addicted to this dream world, what will you discover at its end?

The World of Dreams

Dreams are a manifestation of your complex emotions and consciousness. The monsters and inhabitants you encounter are projections of your own mind. Some may turn against you, while others may assist you on your journey. The dream world is a maze of interconnected dreams, where you, as an addict, will wander endlessly. The experiences you gain in these dreams will be the key to navigating this world.

Skills

This system allows you to harness various powers in the dream world, limited only by your imagination. You’ll dream up new abilities based on the memories you’ve collected in your journey. Certain combinations can unlock powerful effects, and you might even discover entirely new abilities. Find your own unique skill set and use it to your advantage as you explore.

Home

This is the house where you reside. It serves as your base of operations, where you can sleep to enter different dream worlds and where you can materialize new skills or enhance existing ones using the memories and experiences you’ve gathered. There may be other things to explore in your house as well...

The Dream Master

Deep within the dream world lies a powerful monster, known as the Dream Master. Battles with the Dream Master are inescapable and must be fought to the death. Defeating them allows you to progress to the next dream world and obtain materials needed to create powerful new skills.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-6260U, Celeron G6900
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
